hero.name: ALONSO
hero.tagline: Building data-driven systems and capturing visual stories. Analytics engineer & photographer based in Lima.

about.label: ABOUT
about.title: HYBRID PROFILE
paragraphs: UPC Communication & Marketing graduate with a unique trajectory. Not quite a 'data person,' not purely a 'creative,' and definitely not just a 'developer.' All three, seamlessly integrated.
My approach: say yes to challenges, research obsessively, build incrementally, automate relentlessly. If it's done twice, it should be automated. If there's a better way, I'll find it.

Currently at Reset Comunicaciones building enterprise analytics tools that transform how the agency processes market intelligence. From media buying to full-stack development—the path was unconventional, but every skill compounds.

skills.title: ANALYTICS & RESEARCH
skills.description: TGI specialist, Kantar Ibope, psychographic segmentation, GA4, consumer insights, strategic market analysis

skills.title: DEVELOPMENT
skills.description: Python, React, FastAPI, Google Cloud, Docker, CI/CD. 1,885+ lines of automation adopted company-wide

skills.title: MEDIA & STRATEGY
skills.description: 360° campaigns, media buying/planning, ROI optimization (4x sustained), Meta/Google/TikTok Ads

projects.title: ENTERPRISE WEB SUITE
projects.description: Full-stack platform centralizing media analysis tools. FastAPI + React architecture with automated Kantar Ibope processing, custom geographic maps, and interactive TGI visualizations. Deployed on Google Cloud with CI/CD.

projects.title: PONLE CORAZÓN CAMPAIGN
projects.description: Benevolent campaign for Fundación Peruana de Cáncer achieving 92% national reach. Coordinated 7 TV channels, 13 radio stations, and 55 OOH elements across 8 cities. Presented post-campaign analysis and strategic recommendations to foundation board.

projects.title: SAN FERNANDO E-COMMERCE
projects.description: Sustained 4x ROI managing 55%+ of total e-commerce revenue through optimized Meta & Google campaigns. Strategic audience segmentation with continuous A/B testing and performance tracking.

projects.title: UTM AUTOMATION
projects.description: 1,885 lines of JavaScript automating digital campaign implementation. Eliminates operational errors, adopted company-wide at Reset. Processes thousands of campaign parameters with zero friction.

projects.title: EDITORIAL WORK
projects.description: Fashion editorial shoots and portrait photography across multiple continents. Exhibited at Museo de Arte Contemporáneo de Cusco (2022) and Asociación Cultural Tierra Baldía, Lima (2021).

contact.title: LET'S CONNECT
contact.description: Available for collaborations, consulting, or just a conversation about analytics, development, or photography.
